sqlMap.select:
select voucher_code as vouchercode, acct_code as acctcode, crdr as crdr, value as value, text as text, dealId as dealId, payment_service_code as paymentServiceId, creation_date as createdate, status as status, entry_code as entrycode, post_date as postDate, entry_type as entryType, currency_code as currencyCode, EXCHANGE_RATE as exchangeRate, transaction_date as transactiondate, bentry_id as id, update_date as updateDate, balance as balance, pay_date as payDate, balance_direct as maBlanceBy from T_BALANCE_ENTRY where dealId = #serialNo# and deal_code = #dealCode#
voucher_code = #voucherCode#
